text: O vy, kotoryye uverovali v Istinu Allakha i poklonilis' Yemu! Povinuytes' Allakhu svoimi serdtsami i otvechayte na Yego Poslaniye, peredannoye vam Yego poslannikom. On prizyvayet vas soblyudat' nazidaniya Allakha, kotoryye ozhivlyayut vashi tela, dushi, umy i serdtsa. Bud'te uvereny, chto Allakh Vsevyshniy znayet taynoye vashikh serdets i napravlyayet ikh, kak zhelayet. Ved' On stoit mezhdu vami i vashimi serdtsami, kogda ikh okhvatyvayut strasti, i spasayet vas ot durnykh poryvov, yesli vy vstayote na pryamoy put' istiny. Vse vy k Nemu budete sobrany v Sudnyy den', i togda vy poluchite vozdayaniye
